My Experience

Experience

What I learnt from life kicking me around.

Risk Analyst, Deloitte USI

Working as a Risk and Financial Analyst developing RPA tools using Python, Selenium, JavaScript, and Java which has reduced 72 hours of manual work to 3 hours of automation script execution.

Intern, Cipla

Designed a non-invasive technique to evaluate lung function through the measurement of both airway resistance and reactance by utilizing the principle of impulse oscillometry in a MATLAB environment.

Intern, Forbes Marshall

Developed an RTU-based Laser Light Security System using a 555-timer applying fundamental principles of integrated electronics in a Node JS environment.

Volunteer Work

The things I do to cope with my existentialism.

  • 2014-2015

    Poona School And Home for the Blind

    I would visit the home twice a week, serve the students their midday meals, and watch in awe as they worked on everything from handicrafts to sculptures. It was truly fascinating.

  • March 2020

    Niyamat is Born

    Frustrated with the lack of awareness surrounding mental health in our society, I started to develop an educational mental health application intended to make therapy more accessible.

  • September 2020

    Her Tempo

    When was the last time you listened to a female DJ, composer, or instrumentalist? I tried to tackle gender disparity in music with a podcast about female musicians.

  • August 2020

    Resolve to Donate

    Having started my professional career, I donated to Zomato's Feeding India initiative as well as Save the Children.

  • Be a Part
    of My
    Story!

Facial Palsy Wearable Device

Manipal Institute of Technology.

Developed a wearable device for Bell’s (facial) palsy using IR and Flexi-force sensors in a multidisciplinary team including medical, physiotherapy and engineering students.

Prenatal Care Belt

Developed a prenatal care belt termed ‘Dai Maa’ using pressure and flow-rate detectors and sensor technology for health monitoring purposes in the rural areas of Udupi, Karnataka.

Startup Framework is a website builder for professionals. Startup Framework contains components and complex blocks (PSD+HTML Bootstrap themes and templates) which can easily be integrated into almost any design. All of these components are made in the same style, and can easily be integrated into projects, allowing you to create hundreds of solutions for your future projects.

You can preview Startup Framework here.
